properties.name: file-downloader.http-client.connect-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Connection timeout in seconds for HTTP client.

properties.description: Request timeout in minutes for HTTP client.

properties.description: File request timeout in minutes for HTTP client.

properties.name: file-downloader.http-client.enabled
properties.description: Whether the HTTP client is enabled.

properties.name: file-downloader.http-client.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether SSL is enabled for HTTP client.
